title: Forever My Love
description: THE SONG IS FOREVERShe'd loved him for longer than she cared to remember, loved him when he was a struggling young musician and loved him when he was a star. But everything Kathryn had shared with Brent McQueen was in the past. There was nothing left of their marriage except their daughter and a half-forgotten song on the radio.Suddenly Brent was back in her life, and this time he said he really needed her. With a murderer after him and nowhere else for him to go, Kathryn couldn't turn him away. But as they ran together from a faceless killer, that long-ago song came back to Kathryn, carrying with it memories that just wouldn't fade away ....
author: Heather Graham Pozzessere
